name: Defense
description:
A mission to acquire the materials needed for the Promotion of Defender and Medic Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Defender and Medic Operators well.
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly.

name: Breakthrough
description:
A mission to acquire the materials needed for the Promotion of Guard and Specialist Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Guard and Specialist Operators well.

name: Guard
description:
A mission to acquire the advanced materials needed for the Promotion of Defender and Medic Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Defender and Medic Operators well.
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly.

name: Annihilation Drill
description:
Defend against the enemy's surprise attack.
<@lv.rem>Deployment Points will not automatically recover in this operation; You get 1 Deployment Point upon killing 1 enemy.</>

name: Strike
description:
A mission to acquire the advanced materials needed for the Promotion of Sniper and Caster Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Sniper and Caster Operators well.
<@lv.item><Anti-air Rune></>Operators deployed on it will attack a bit more slowly but their ATK against aerial units will be increased significantly.

name: Charge
description:
A mission to acquire the advanced materials needed for the Promotion of Vanguard and Supporter Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Vanguard and Supporter Operators well.
<@lv.item><Medical Rune></> Operators deployed on it enjoy constant healing.

name: Guerrilla Warfare Drill
description:
Defend against the enemy's surprise attack.
<@lv.rem>Deployment Points will not automatically recover in this operation; You get 1 Deployment Point upon killing 1 enemy.</>

name: Interference
description:
A mission to acquire the materials needed for the Promotion of Sniper and Caster Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Sniper and Caster Operators well.
<@lv.item><Anti-air Rune></>Operators deployed on it will attack a bit more slowly but their ATK against aerial units will be increased significantly.

name: Assault
description:
A mission to acquire the advanced materials needed for the Promotion of Guard and Specialist Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Guard and Specialist Operators well.

name: Skirmish Drill
description:
Defend against the enemy's surprise attack.
<@lv.rem>Deployment Points will not automatically recover in this operation; You get 1 Deployment Point upon killing 1 enemy.</>

name: Rush
description:
A mission to acquire the materials needed for the Promotion of Vanguard and Supporter Operators.
The battle will be easier if you employ Vanguard and Supporter Operators well.
<@lv.item><Medical Rune></> Operators deployed on it enjoy constant healing.

name: Forward Operations Drill
description:
Defend against the enemy's surprise attack.
<@lv.rem>Deployment Points will not automatically recover in this operation; You get 1 Deployment Point upon killing 1 enemy.</>

name: Special Operations Drill
description:
Defend against the enemy's surprise attack.
<@lv.rem>Deployment Points will not automatically recover in this operation; You get 1 Deployment Point upon killing 1 enemy.</>

name: Falling Objects
description:
Massive deployment of enemy Elite Casters confirmed.
Protocol advises destroying them one by one.

name: Suffocation-1
description: Please pay attention to the surprise attack from the south.

name: Artificial Cold
description:
High-energy Originium radiation has been detected in Chernobog.
If enemy units absorb this radiation...
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly.

name: Infection
description: Enemy units equipped with shields have high physical defense. Please deploy Caster Operators to defeat them.

name: Originium Mining Security
description:
Defend against enemies in a hostile environment.
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly

name: Convolution
description:
Enemies equipped with a Detector can disable the effect of Bushes.
Be aware of the enemy leader, who has the ability to disrupt our formation.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Catastrophe
description:
Roadblocks help us control enemy movements when they approach from multiple directions. 
Please deploy Roadblocks to control the flow of battle. 
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy to block a tile on the map. Enemies will attack it if no path is available.

name: Caster-2
description: The enemy's Elite Casters remain the biggest threat. Scatter your Operators to reduce damage taken.

name: Originium Transportation Security
description:
Defend against enemies in a hostile environment.
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly

name: Suffocation-3
description: Please pay attention to the surprise attack launched by enemy aerial units from the east and west.

name: Fortress Siege
description: Defend against enemies with high DEF.

name: Refinery Equipment Security
description:
Defend against enemies in a hostile environment.
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly

name: Mission Area Clearance
description:
Defend against the enemy's aerial units.
<@lv.rem>Melee Operators cannot be deployed.</>

name: Prisoner Transfer Escort
description:
Defend against enemies in a flexible way.
<@lv.rem>The recovery speed of Deployment Points is slow in this operation, but deployment is not limited to melee and ranged cells.</>

name: Dilemma
description: Enemy Junkmen have high HP and ATK. Please deploy Defender Operators to block them, and deploy high-damage Operators to defeat them.

name: Presumption of Innocence
description:
Enemies are coming from too many directions this time, complicating your deployment.
Use Roadblocks to control the enemy's advance.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance.

name: Dusk
description:
Skullshatterer is coming at us with her troops again, only more dangerous...
<@lv.item><Defensive Rune></> Operators deployed on it will have higher DEF

name: Recon-3
description: The route is simple this time. It will be a test for your Operators' strength.

name: Patrol Route Clearance
description:
Defend against the enemy's aerial units.
<@lv.rem>Melee Operators cannot be deployed.</>

name: Recon-2
description:
Enemies are attacking from different routes this time. Please make sure you have enough melee Operators to stop them.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy's ranged attack

name: A Walk in the Rain
description:
Ranged soldiers of another race have joined the battle.
Protocol advises deploying physical Operators to counter them.

name: Hunting
description: Swarms of Originium Slugs are approaching from 9 o'clock. It's recommended to deploy AoE Caster Operators.

name: Caster-3
description: The enemy has sent even more Elite Casters. Scatter the Operators as previous.

name: Collapse
description: The enemy's vanguard has appeared to your three o'clock. Deploy melee Operators to stop them.

name: Prospecting Clearance
description:
Defend against the enemy's aerial units.
<@lv.rem>Melee Operators cannot be deployed.</>

name: Rage-3
description: There is not much space for melee Operators this time. Try using Specialist Operators to cope with the tough enemies on the left.

name: Industrial Equipment Escort
description:
Defend against enemies in a flexible way.
<@lv.rem>The recovery speed of Deployment Points is slow in this operation, but deployment is not limited to melee and ranged cells.</>

name: Resolve
description:
Be careful of the large number of approaching enemies, but keep an eye on the agile Reunion leader.
The Stun Generator can stop her movement for a short time.
<@lv.item><Stun Generator></> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

name: No Promises
description:
Some vantage points on the roof are ideal for sniping the enemy's aerial units.
Also, the roof is not surrounded by railings. Can we use that to our advantage...?
<@lv.item><Anti-Air Rune></> Operators deployed on it will attack a bit more slowly but their ATK against aerial units will be increased significantly

name: Base Siege
description: Defend against enemies with high DEF.

name: Medical Clearance
description:
Defend against the enemy's aerial units.
<@lv.rem>Melee Operators cannot be deployed.</>

name: Call
description:
Enemy's Invisible Casters have been confirmed on the battlefield.
Eliminate them first as they pose a greater threat.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Ignorance
description:
Unknown creatures infected with Oripathy have been found on the battlefield. They deal massive damage to nearby Operators when they die.
In addition, please look out for Heated Paths. They emit burning gas.
<@lv.item><Heated Path></> Deals massive damage to Operators and enemies on it at intervals.

name: Rage-1
description: Please pay attention to the joint attack of enemy's Originium Slugs and alien elite Casters.

name: Mutual Benefits
description:
A large number of creatures infected with Oripathy have appeared on the battlefield!
Think carefully about when to destroy them.
<@lv.item><Heated Path></> Deals massive damage to Operators and enemies on it at intervals.

name: Classified Information Escort
description:
Defend against enemies in a flexible way.
<@lv.rem>The recovery speed of Deployment Points is slow in this operation, but deployment is not limited to melee and ranged cells.</>

name: To Lungmen
description: The paths on the battlefield are tortuous. Consider using Supporter Operators to suppress the enemy's elite units.

name: Slow-1
description: Please pay attention to the enemy's shielded soldiers, who have high defense.

name: Pursuit
description: Enemy unmanned drones have entered the battlefield. Please deploy your Sniper Operators to deal with them.

name: War of Words
description: More enemies with high defense have appeared in the center of the battlefield. Supporter and Caster Operators can reduce their combat power significantly.

name: Caster-1
description: The enemy's Elite Casters have scattered. Protocol advises taking them out one by one with Sniper Operators.

name: Isolated Island
description:
The battlefield is narrower than before, and the enemies have gotten stronger.
Please make sure your Operators have been upgraded before entering the battlefield.

name: Trap-2
description: Enemies have become stronger. Using the terrain is still the key to victory.

name: Decision
description:
The enemy has deployed many invisible ranged units.
Use the Detector to launch a counterattack.
<@lv.item><Detector></> Once activated, it will reveal nearby invisible enemies for a period of time.

name: Blockade-2
description:
The battlefield is even more complicated now. Think carefully before deploying the Roadblocks.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance

name: Myriapoda-1
description: Please be careful of the Originium Slugs in the south and the north and don't let them go through our defense.

name: Penguin Logistics
description:
Enemy Elite Casters confirmed.
This type of enemy can pose a huge threat to your Operators. Scatter them.

name: Slow-2
description: Please pay attention to the aerial units to the north and south.

name: Protection
description: The enemy has sent more troops. Please make sure you have at least 1 Medic Operator in the squad for healing.

name: Corruption
description: Enemy hounds are extremely fast and can easily slip through our defenses early on. Please deploy a Vanguard Operator to stop them.

name: Brawl
description: More enemy drones have entered the battlefield. Please make sure your Sniper Operators are in a position to deal with them.

name: Myriapoda-2
description: The battlefield is narrow this time. Please think carefully about where to deploy Operators.

name: The Tyrant
description:
Please combine your Operators' firepower with the Stun Generator on the battlefield to stop the enemy attack.
<@lv.item><Stun Generator></> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

name: Ore Warehouse Security
description:
Defend against enemies in a hostile environment.
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly

name: A Matter of Public Health
description: Enemy's new aerial units have been confirmed on your 1 o'clock and 7 o'clock. Please exercise caution.

name: Lurking-1
description: Please pay attention to the joint attack of enemy's invisible units and Casters.

name: Cluster-2
description:
Enemies are coming from more directions. Still it's recommended to build your defense around the Active Originium.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly

name: Bureaucracy
description: Enemy melee Arts units have been confirmed on the battlefield. Avoid engaging in melee combat with them. Stay alert.

name: Hold on Tight
description:
The roof is wide enough to deploy a variety of formations.
Still, watch out for surprise attacks...

name: Running Wild
description:
This battlefield is wider and enemies will attack from two paths.
Please note that enemies coming from the southern path have higher defense. Think carefully about where to deploy your Operators.

name: Remnants
description:
We are not far from the outskirts of Chernobog. Hang in there and victory will be ours.
Please pay attention to enemy ranged units and protect your own ranged Operators.

name: Rout
description:
Enemies won't slow down their attack even during a Catastrophe.
Please pay attention to enemy ranged units and protect your own ranged Operators.

name: Ruins Siege
description: Defend against enemies with high DEF.

name: Pyrrhic Victory
description:
W's troops have launched their attack from Chernobog's labyrinthine streets. Make good use of the environment.
<@lv.item><Stun Generator></> Pay a cost to activate it, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

name: Lurking-2
description: Enemy only focuses their attack on one spot, but still it's recommended to deploy Operators in the rear.

name: Rage-2
description: Scatter the Operators and use ranged Operators to take out the Originium Slugs from afar.

name: Recon-1
description:
Making good use of the Bushes and the Detector is the key to victory.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy's ranged attack
<@lv.item><Detector></> Once activated, it will disable the invisibility of nearby enemies for a certain period

name: Strategic Route Clearance
description:
Defend against the enemy's aerial units.
<@lv.rem>Melee Operators cannot be deployed.</>

name: Meeting
description:
When fighting in the wild, Operators can take cover in some forms of terrain to reduce damage taken, but please pay attention to the enemy's invisible troops.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Blockade Running
description: Mixed enemy troops are coming from the west. Please make good use of the tactics you just learned, and assemble a suitable squad to deal with them.

name: Crack
description:
An previously unknown enemy leader and an elite team are launching a ferocious attack from 6 o'clock.
Deploy operators to engage immediately!
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Paralysis
description: This battle takes place on Chernobog's main street. Please have at least 4 melee Operators in the squad to block all the enemies.

name: Outpost Siege
description: Defend against enemies with high DEF.

name: Acute Stress Disorder
description: A force of mixed enemy troops advances on us from the east. Prepare to engage.

name: Refinery Security
description:
Defend against enemies in a hostile environment.
<@lv.item><Poison Haze></> Operators lose HP constantly

name: Beyond Cure
description:
Skullshatterer attacks with her troops! This complicated battlefield will be a test of your skills.
<@lv.item><Medical Rune></> Operators deployed on it are healed over time.

name: Blockade-1
description:
Deploy Roadblocks in the right places to stop enemies advancing from two directions.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance

name: Myriapoda-3
description: The battlefield is even narrower. It's recommended to upgrade Operators to get through it.

name: Rare Material Escort
description:
Defend against enemies in a flexible way.
<@lv.rem>The recovery speed of Deployment Points is slow in this operation, but deployment is not limited to melee and ranged cells.</>

name: Bad to the Bone
description:
Enemy Elite Casters of another race have been confirmed on the battlefield.
They seem to have special powers. Please be careful.
<@lv.item><Heated Path></> Deals massive damage to Operators and enemies on it at intervals.

name: Stronghold Siege
description: Defend against enemies with high DEF.

name: Consolation
description: Melee soldiers of another race have been confirmed in Chernobog. Please be careful.

name: Nerves of Steel
description:
The enemy has launched their final attack and approaches from all directions! Deploy Operators to repel them immediately.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></>Deploy it to block the enemy's advance.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly.

name: Furniture Shipping Escort
description:
Defend against enemies in a flexible way.
<@lv.rem>The recovery speed of Deployment Points is slow in this operation, but deployment is not limited to melee and ranged cells.</>

name: Nearl
description: More enemy Originium Slugs and shielded soldiers have arrived on the battlefield. Use a combination of Defender Operators and AoE Caster Operators to suppress them.

name: Suffocation-2
description: The battlefield is completely divided again. Try to defend against enemies from both directions.

name: Cubiculum Obscurum
description:
The battlefield is narrow this time. Please make sure you have enough melee Operators to stop enemies.
<@lv.item><Anti-Air Rune></> Operators deployed on it will attack a bit more slowly but their ATK against aerial units will be increased significantly

name: Extinguished Flames
description:
FrostNova and her elite team have the area completely surrounded.
All we can do now is to engage and hold them at our perimeter.

name: Assault
description: The path at the bottom of the battlefield has been opened. Please deploy multiple Vanguard Operators to stop the hounds.

name: Cluster-1
description:
Make good use of the Active Originium in the middle of the battlefield and things will be much easier.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly

name: Memory
description:
The enemy has sent even more ranged units.
Eliminate them first as they pose a greater threat.
<@lv.item><Bush></> Operators deployed on it will not be targeted by enemy ranged attacks.

name: Trap-1
description: The roof is not surrounded by railings. Make good use of that and things will be much easier.

name: Roar
description:
The battlefield is complicated. Use Roadblocks to guide enemies into range of our Snipers.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy it to block the enemy's advance
<@lv.item><Detector></> Once activated, it will reveal nearby invisible enemies for a period of time.

name: Omen
description: The battlefield is even wider this time. You will need at least 3 melee Operators to block all the enemies.

name: Cluster-3
description:
The alien force has split into two. It may be a good choice to consume their HP by the Active Originium.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></>Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and Attack Speed will be increased significantly

name: Inexpressible
description: A large number of Reunion forces have been spotted in urbanized areas of Lungmen. Beware of Breakers approaching from 12 o'clock.

name: In Life and in Death
description:
Frost Drones greatly reduce the Attack Speed of our nearby units. Counter them with operators or Jammers to prevent them from using their abilities. 
<@lv.item><Jammer></> can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

name: The Devil
description:
Things just keep getting stranger... Enemy Veteran Junkmen now have regenerative abilities as well. Take care to eliminate them as quickly as possible. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Surprise Attack
description:
The enemy's Arts Master drones are highly maneuverable and capable of launching Arts attacks from above. Counter them with our newly developed Drone Jammer. 
<@lv.item><Jammer></> can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

name: Intimate Knowledge
description:
A group of strange enemy soldiers with regeneration abilities have arrived on the battlefield. Eliminate them as quickly as possible. Arrange your deployment to avoid enemy Turrets. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Panic-1
description:
Possessed Soldier Leaders can regenerate faster and pose a serious threat. Take them out first. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Panic-2
description:
Defense Crushers are enemy elite units specialized in defense. Their attacks can also stun our melee units. Take advantage of their slow moving speed to counter them. 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Cycle of Enmity
description: Enemy units have been spotted in the wilds outside Lungmen. Beware of the swift moving Breakers and well-protected Spec Ops Casters in particular.

name: Unending War
description: An enhanced version of the enemy Bombtail drone has entered the battle. Their AOE damaging explosive bombs can make quick work of our defensive line. Do what you can to counter them beforehand.

name: Entrenched-2
description: The situation in the field is getting more complicated. Carefully deploy melee Operators to stop the swarm of enemy Breakers.

name: Entrenched-1
description: The enemies continue their massed assault. Beware of the Wraiths sneaking in from above.

name: The Dark Before Dawn
description:
We are now deep behind enemy lines and there is no going back. Use your tactical expertise and find a way through the crossfire between Mephisto and Faust! 
<@lv.item><Turrets></> periodically fire bolts, dealing Physical damage to our units.

name: Nobody's Home
description: A swarm of enemy drones approaches from 4 directions. Beware of a new type of enemy drone, the bomb-carrying Bombtails.

name: Biting Cold-2
description:
The enemy force is a mix of Arts Masters and Frost Drones making it increasingly difficult to handle. Make use of Sniper and Caster Operators and don't forget our Jammers! 
<@lv.item><Jammer></> can stop nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduce their speed, and prevent them from activating special abilities after being deployed.

name: Biting Cold-1
description: Well armored Frost Drones are causing havoc with our forces. Counter them with Caster Operators.

name: Courage and Mortality
description: Enemy Spec Ops Caster Leaders have spread throughout the battlefield. They can break our operators in an instant without proper preparation against their Arts attacks. Plan carefully.

name: Snow Upon the Tundra
description:
The Yeti Squadron has placed special Originium facilities around the battlefield. Please be prepared to respond accordingly. 
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Stand Firm-1
description: A large number of elite enemies have appeared. Please be careful.

name: Condensation-2
description: A failure to handle the synergy between Infused Glacial Originium Slugs and Icecleavers will result in massive losses.

name: Hover-1
description:
A large number of unmanned enemy drones have appeared on this operation. Please take charge of the anti-air defense.
<@lv.item><Jammer></> Stops nearby enemy drones from firing, greatly reduces their speed, and prevents them from activating special abilities.

name: Hover-2
description: Enemies attack from different directions in this battle. Be careful of the large number of Casters that are approaching.

name: Frost Upon the Tundra
description:
The 'Oneiros' drones controlled by the Yeti Squadron are capable of inflicting Arts damage in an area upon our Operators, as well as inflicting the Cold status. Please prioritize taking them down.
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Who to Kill?
description: A large number of both melee and ranged Possessed Soldiers have appeared. Perhaps a well-planned defense can halt their onslaught...

name: Different Perspective
description: The Yeti Squadron, in addition to fielding casters that specialize in ice-based Arts, has also released Originium Slugs that explode in a shower of rime upon death. Please exercise caution.

name: Bells of Liberation
description: The icecleavers, a special group of combatants of the Yeti Squadron, deal massive damage to frozen Operators. Stay calm when fighting them.

name: Festering Scars
description: This area is under attack by aggressive hosts that hurl projectiles at us. Please beware of their long-range attacks.

name: Hoarfrost-2
description:
Surrounded by a harsh environment filled with Originium Ice Crystals and powerful Icecleavers, how are we to mount a response to this attack? 
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></>Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: 'Times Like These'
description: A large number of Yeti Squadron troops have launched an offensive against us, and an arduous battle looms ahead. Make good use of our Operators' various strengths and aim to defeat the enemy.

name: Condensation-1
description: The Yeti Squadron is utilizing Infused Glacial Originium Slugs in their assault upon us. Please be careful of these aberrant creatures.

name: Deadlock
description: Heavily-armored Infected hosts have appeared in Lungmen's urban districts. Not only are they able to shrug off most blows, but they are also capable of regenerating. Exercise caution when dealing with them.

name: Hoarfrost-1
description: An attack from a large number of Infused Glacial Originium Slugs, followed by a wave of Icecleavers, will inflict catastrophic damage to insufficiently prepared squads.

name: Lost at Once
description: The ranks of these aggressive hosts continue to grow, and they will soon apply heavy pressure to our formation. However, their lives seem to also be quickly burning out...

name: Nostalgia
description: Enemy icecleavers have been spotted in conjunction with Oneiros drones. As this will surely be a very difficult battle, please plan carefully to deal with various status abnormalities and enemy attacks.

name: It Fell From the Sky!
description: The legendary Yeti Squadron, an elite anti-Ursus squad of Infected, has appeared in a Chernobog sub-city. Their fighting style is unlike any Reunion forces we've encountered before, so make sure not to underestimate them.

name: Black Rabbit, White Rabbit
description:
Before us stands the commander of the Yeti Squadron, FrostNova, enhanced with a terrifying power we've never seen before. As she is one of the strongest warriors in Reunion, we must utilize every bit of our strength to overcome her.
<@lv.item><Originium Ice Crystal></> Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold to affected allied units.

name: Misunderstandings
description: What kind of abominations are those?! New, grotesque Infected combatants have been seen throughout the combat zones of Lungmen. Their speed and power greatly exceed that of regular hosts, so please be careful!

name: Ignition-1
description: This battle requires us to concentrate our firepower upon swarms of enemies.

name: Behold, the Twilight Comes
description:
Memory and reality have both been completely released, and she knows her time has come. 
(Part of this story cannot be skipped the first time you experience it.)
<@lv.item><Heated Path></>Periodically deals great damage to any units on it.

name: Aegis of the Infected-1
description: The horn has been sounded. Face the legendary guerillas of Ursus, and turn their own tactics against them! However, those heavily-armored guerilla warriors are indeed the most terrifying combatants of the Ursus army...

name: Silent Butcher
description:
The Empire of Ursus has lost many elites throughout its many wars, but is always able to cultivate more. Just as an empire should. 
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy to block the enemy's route.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: The Heart, Fickle and Impermanent
description:
If you wish to prove yourself before a legend, you must first <@lv.sp>approach perfection</>. Only the commoners shall bleed. Only the noble shall face slander. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: A Game of Cards
description: Those standing in the sunlight haven't yet noticed the shadows gathering atop their very heads.

name: Breakout
description: The enemy spills into every street, looking to hide their secrets. Only those who go forth with courage can prevent a massacre.

name: Aegis of the Infected-2
description:
We cannot destroy them, so we will do our best not to be destroyed by them. We must achieve a tactical victory. We strive to paralyze their spinal cord and expose the giant's head to us.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: The Ghost Crisis
description: A well hidden enemy might as well be a ghost.

name: Fury of the Silent-1
description:
We've found a strange Sarkaz Originium altar in the hub layer... The altar seems to have a strange effect upon the surrounding environment, but we can also leverage it to mount a defense against the enemy.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Side by Side-1
description: The spearhead of Reunion's reconnaissance force has appeared at the location where we established a concealed facility. Be careful, these are no ordinary Reunion grunts that we're dealing with.

name: Snowfall, Blackening the Earth
description:
Yet, they do not regard anyone as an 'enemy.' The dead and the incompetent have never been among their ranks.
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Oatstalk, Easily Alight
description:
Righteous anger from witnessing such brutality is justified. Ursus's manglers are well-trained, and their fangs do not cease just because of their victims' emotions. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units. 
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Abnormality-1
description: A number of possessed enemies have appeared during this battle. Please make sure to fortify your defenses.

name: Arise, Treading Through Flames
description:
06:26:33 <@lv.sp>Split flame with sword</>, defeat the past with the present, and confront the chaotic with one's self. Rage, and know no compromise. Rage, and keep no silence. 
<@lv.item><Energy Aggregate></>Releases fireballs in the four cardinal directions, dealing Arts damage and inflicting [Burning Breath] (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be resisted)

name: Gunfire in the Night
description:
Mandragora is in no way impossible to overcome, but our objective is not to defeat her alone. The dark clouds conceal the sun, and the night that follows will be interminably long, but it is fortunate that there remain those who pass on hope.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.
<@lv.item><Demolition Device></> Directly knocks down a Tattered Pillar one tile in front.

name: Battlefield Rescue
description: Even if it must cross a raging inferno, Rhodes Island will not abandon a single Infected who needs help.

name: Victorian Soldier
description:
From one end of the city to the other, a Victorian soldier fends off an army.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.

name: Low Fires All About
description: In this city, there's either conflict or the rumblings of it. Just where is the lighter of this fire hiding?

name: Malediction, Bound for Retribution
description: She has not yet died, but she has already seen too much death.

name: Holding Ruins
description:
The unrelenting firefight has destroyed the streets, but we still must come up with every way to stop the enemy.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.

name: Flames of the Faint
description:
Sarkaz warriors have entered the battlefield, but be wary - they don't seem to be from the same faction as the guerillas. They even seem to draw inspiration from the Originium altars...?!
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Tug-o'-War
description: We strive to take back this city. But will the ghosts go easily?

name: Awakening, a Dream's End
description: An origin, a purpose, a fate, a demise. A tragedy that claims the Herd, all of them. Who can truly <@lv.sp>choose</> their own life?

name: Forgotten Lands
description: We've encountered guerilla messengers on our way to the central area of the core city. They employ a unique method of communication and commanding, and we may perhaps be able to draw some inspiration from fighting against them...

name: War, Sprawling Without Cease
description:
The mightiest and meekest both share the same tenacity. 
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.
<@lv.item><Patriot's Originium Altar></> Periodically releases gas in the surrounding 4 tiles, inflicting heavy damage to enemies.

name: Banner in the Wind
description:
Battered in the storm and rain, some hold their position firm, and some bravely step forth.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.

name: The Innocent
description: There is evil taking place, and the innocent die for an ideal. Strange stone statues have appeared on the battlefield, rising silently above the ruins.

name: Death of a Patriot
description:
They are commanded by the 'Aegis' of the Infected. The most ancient bloodline among the warriors of Sarkaz. Ursus's indomitable incarnation of war. The backbone of the Reunion Movement. Yelena's father.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.
<@lv.item><Interference Mine></>Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding tiles and amplifies the damage they take for 15 seconds.

name: Stained-2
description:
As Reunion's elite warriors, the Sarkaz Mercenaries have shown formidable strength. Only by defeating them can we continue forward.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></> Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.
<@lv.item><Roadblock></> Deploy to block the enemy's route

name: Unrivaled
description: Who has witnessed a battle like this before? Who can survive such a battlefield? Even a simple skirmish has struck fear into our hearts. We do not have the ability to defeat them. We must escape to where they cannot see us.

name: 'Daybreak'
description:
Her light struck through the dark veil above.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.
<@lv.item><Demolition Device></> Directly knocks down a Tattered Pillar one tile in front.

name: Fury of the Silent-2
description:
Our enemies are no longer fighting in the characteristic style of scattered guerillas. Now is a head-on clash between tactics. Formulate your combat strategy appropriately, and deal a critical blow to the enemy.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Hide-and-Seek
description:
The ghosts have shown in formation amidst the blaze's light, but the thief still hides behind the scenes.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.
<@lv.item><Demolition Device></> Directly knocks down a Tattered Pillar one tile in front.

name: Guerilla-1
description: The mortars used by the guerillas pose a significant threat to us. These weapons taken from Ursus's military arsenal are terrifying incarnations of the very essence of war.

name: Apparitional Waves
description:
Eliminate one, and there are even more. The enemy pours forth endlessly, only the city itself seeming to pay the price.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.
<@lv.item><Demolition Device></> Directly knocks down a Tattered Pillar one tile in front.
<@lv.item><Active Originium></> Operators deployed on it and enemies who have passed it will take constant damage, but their ATK and ASPD will be increased significantly.

name: Concealed-1
description: A large number of invisible enemies have surrounded the battlefield. Prepare to face them with a solid frontline and far-sighted scouts.

name: Critical Value
description: The downpour is here, the enemy is everywhere, and the frustration is slowly reaching the breaking point.

name: Reunited, Only to Separate
description:
To lose. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Guerilla-2
description: The guerillas' Vertical Strike Squad has withstood harsh trials and brutal wars. They've fought Ursus for more than a decade, and their will is nigh indomitable. We have but a single moment for a chance at victory.

name: Scalding Earth
description:
The enemy's flames push through the city ruins. Those of conviction tread the firelight and forge on.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.

name: Dublinn
description: In the wake of a surprise attack, the ghosts climb out of the ashes.

name: Thunder's Rumble
description:
To purge the shadows that creep into every corner, the city is forced to tear apart its own flesh.
<@lv.item><Tattered Pillar></> Can be knocked down by neighboring Operators, dealing True damage to the two tiles it falls on and forming rubble that blocks routes.
<@lv.item><Demolition Device></> Directly knocks down a Tattered Pillar one tile in front.

name: Innocent Flesh and Blood
description:
In the tundras of Ursus, every living creature is under suspicion. They may be murderers, thugs, spies, or simply innocents. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units. 
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Baptism by Tractor Fire
description:
Within the Ursus Army, the history of the Artillery Corps is not particularly lengthy. They are more than happy to arm themselves with the newest technology, and have little concern to spare for who their enemies are. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Sparks, Extinguished in a Touch
description:
Sometimes, protecting others is not a goal, but a process. Also, Ursus's crossbowmen also privately believe that killing others is not a goal, but a process. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></> Can block the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.
<@lv.item><Ursus Civilian></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.

name: Cold, Only Perceived
description:
The lowest recorded temperatures of the Northwestern Tundras are sometimes not as bone-chilling as the words of certain individuals. 
<@lv.item><Talulah, the Fighter></> Life Points will be deducted by 1 when killed by an enemy.
<@lv.item><FrostNova's Originium Ice Crystal></> Periodically releases a frigid wave that will inflict Cold on affected enemy units.

name: Side by Side-2
description: Various Reunion members patrol the passages of the hub layer in the heart of Chernobog. Don't take them lightly; their uniforms... are the same as the Infected guerillas that once fought in the northern tundra of Ursus.

name: Night of Farewells
description: Remnants of Reunion's forces remain entrenched in the streets of Lungmen, desperately resisting to the bitter end. Prepare for combat.

name: Farewell, to Reunite Once More
description: 07:29:28 Though some friends may be willing to share your pain, you should perhaps <@lv.sp>reach out to them</>. And some may never have been your friends in the first place.

name: Yesterday, the Chaff Cracked
description:
In the remote tundra, patrol squads, dressed in black beetle-like uniforms, comb through remote villages to hunt down the Infected. 
<@lv.item><Static Roadblock></>Blocks the movement of Ursus Civilians and Talulah, the Fighter; Can be destroyed by your units.

name: No Time to Mourn
description:
Save our soldiers, or at least remember their names. 
<@lv.item><Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery></> Once fully charged, deals area True damage to both allies and enemies, centered on the friendly unit with the highest Block.

name: A Sliver of Light
description: Nobody can promise the coming of peace, but that won't stop them in their stride.

name: Equivalent Exchange
description:
Here, history stands silently, laden with dust. Is it titles that give people honor, or vice versa?
<@lv.item><Allerdale's Guard></> Forms an AOE barrier for allies.

name: Keeping Up Honors
description:
While still beyond the notice of pure and simple children, the seeds have been irrevocably planted for so many things.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Sarkaz Royal Court Casters have increased ATK.

name: Steam Rising
description: People aren't obstinate, life is. Living is. Irrevocable loss is.

name: A Life for a Life
description:
Helplessness is the base shade to all life.
<@lv.item><Twigs That Crave></> Produces Rot Eaters when destroyed or at the end of the stage.
<@lv.item><Allerdale's Guard></> Forms an AOE barrier for allies.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Caster and Sniper Operators cannot be deployed, and more enemies will appear.

name: Battered and Bruised
description:
From within the crevices between ruined buildings, they strain to see a sliver of sunlight. 
<@lv.item><Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery></> Once fully charged, deals area True damage to both allies and enemies, centered on the friendly unit with the highest Block.

name: Ne'er to Stop
description:
The way back is cut off. We can only press onward.
<@lv.item><Allerdale's Guard></> Forms an AOE barrier for allies.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Some enemies will differ, and more enemies will appear.

name: Back to the Flames
description:
Those holding their homeland fast have found themselves encircled, but the city has its own ways when it comes to handling enemies.

name: Culture Unfolding
description:
War cannot destroy a nation. Not until its culture, too, begins to die out.
<@lv.item><Allerdale's Guard></> Forms an AOE barrier for allies.

name: Come as a Torrent
description:
The one stood here has no particular status nor reputation; her goal is simply that peace may return to the people's lives.

<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>

<@lv.item><Medical Rune></> Operators deployed on this tile will restore HP over time.

description:

name: A Face-to-Face Meeting
description:

Touches of the Sanguinarch have increased Movement Speed and are invisible.

name: Renegade Blade
description: Mephisto's Herd is no longer under the control of its leader, but their bottomless aggression has prompted them to attack Rhodes Island's ship. Put them out of their misery.

name: Stained-1
description:
Sarkaz Casters have appeared on the battlefield, and it seems like the Originium Altars may be affecting their Arts. However, don't panic - we have ways of dealing with them.
<@lv.item><Originium Altar></>Periodically emits Pulse Waves to the surrounding tiles, damaging both allied and enemy units.

name: Ambush-1
description:
Make good use of neural interference landmines to deal with guerillas that are difficult to injure through normal means.
<@lv.item><Interference Mine></>Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding tiles and amplifies the damage they take for 15 seconds.

name: Ambush-2
description:
Use interference mines to establish a defensive line, expand our advantages, and accomplish our strategic goals.
<@lv.item><Interference Mine></>Upon explosion, deals heavy damage to enemies in the surrounding tiles and amplifies the damage they take for 15 seconds.

name: Fleeing Through Fire
description:
The ground is subsiding, their refuge is collapsed, and the soldiers bear nothing but wrenches and hammers.

name: Kin or Otherwise
description:
There's many a reason they agree to work together. They choose at times to be allies, at times to be enemies, and at times, they have no other choice. 
<@lv.item><Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery></> Once fully charged, deals area True damage to both allies and enemies, centered on the friendly unit with the highest Block.

name: Shadows of Days Past
description:
Memories cast their shadows at you. Fear, hatred, the insurmountable gap between life and death, and your old acquaintances. 
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions: </>
Bloodthirsty Heirs have significantly increased bloodsucking ability and increased HP.

name: Shadows of Days Past
description: Memories cast their shadows at you. Fear, hatred, the insurmountable gap between life and death, and your old acquaintances.

name: Raid Target
description:
The walls tower before us. The thoroughways are a labyrinth. We need a guide. 
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions: </>
Sarkaz Royal Court Soldiers have increased HP, and the DP Cost of Guard and Sniper Operators is tripled.

name: Bloodblade on High
description:

name: Warning Shot

name: Breath of the City
description: Veins pulse from deep underground, their sound covered by the military vehicles making through the streets.

name: A Citadel and Its Walls
description:
Victoria's child is braced against this land, and still, though riven and worn, it has not yet fallen. 
<@lv.item><Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery></> Once fully charged, deals area True damage to both allies and enemies, centered on the friendly unit with the highest Block.

name: Warning Shot
description:
The daily life the people desperately cling to melts away in a single massive rumble. 
<@lv.item><Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery></> Once fully charged, deals area True damage to both allies and enemies, centered on the friendly unit with the highest Block. 
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions: </>
Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery starting energy is increased, and DP regeneration rate is decreased.

name: Bloodblade on High
description:
Both the workers who built Londinium and the lofty noble aristocrats are to be forced by calamity down the same road. 
<@lv.item><Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery></> Once fully charged, deals area True damage to both allies and enemies, centered on the friendly unit with the highest Block.

name: Wargame Drill
description:
Defend against the enemy's surprise attack.
<@lv.rem>Deployment Points will not automatically recover in this operation; You get 1 Deployment Point upon killing 1 enemy.</>

name: Years of Passion
description:
No matter how I look at them, something about these old clothes seems off. Did someone wash them for me?
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Fewer <Roadside Emergency Reserves>; some enemies are different.

name: Hats Off
description:
The loyal subjects are saluting before the king's procession.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Allied units have increased Redeployment Time; enemy units have increased Movement Speed.

name: Against the Light
description:
No one can proclaim themselves able to bear the responsibility of the country's future.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.
Some characters cannot be deployed in this stage.

name: Unity is Luxury
description:
All are equal before the flames of war. Do not entrust all your hope to others and lose sight of your own strength.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.

name: The Abandoned
description:
'If sacrifices are unavoidable, why not save them for the reaper?'
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.

name: Sincere Invitation
description:
A face-to-face meeting that transcends even time. Alas, you did not receive an invitation.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Terrain and enemies will differ in places.

name: Reunion Under Fire
description:
Reunions are not always accompanied by flowers.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.

name: Hats Off
description:
The loyal subjects are saluting before the king's procession.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.

name: Battered and Bruised
description:
Shapeless rumors can penetrate impregnable defenses.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.

name: Brittle Steel
description:
A reed survives the fierce gales, while a mighty oak topples. The old workers seem to know this well.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Starting cost limit is reduced; Armed Spies have increased ATK.

name: Benevolent Betrayal
description:
Villains seem to always have the upper hand over the virtuous. Not because they are stronger, but because they see morality as a weapon, instead of a standard.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.

name: Fly, Fireworks
description:
When you make a wish before the flames, perhaps the gift you yearn for will fall from the sky.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Terrain and enemies will differ in places.

name: Good Night
description:
We received no air-raid alarms today. We wish everybody the most pleasant of dreams.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Starting DP and cost limit reduced; some enemies are different.

name: Good Night
description:

Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.item><Roadside Emergency Reserves></> When destroyed, grants a certain amount of DP and cost limit.

name: Whose War
description:
When the sounds of cannon fire ring in their ears, soldiers and civilians alike ponder the same question.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
Enemy units have increased ASPD and Movement Speed; some enemies are different.

name: Ears Muffed
description:
When bombarded by noise, we have two choices. We can cover our ears, or block the source of it.
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
<@lv.fs>Environmental Conditions:</>
'Shadowing Trilby Ashers' have increased HP; all Ranged tiles are no longer available for deployment.

name: Broadcast Hotline is Busy
description:
'You're standing right here. How come your voice is in the broadcast?'

name: Discourse of Life and Death
description:
Do not forget that while we debate the ultimate proposition of life and death, there is another group struggling between life and death and providing evidence for our arguments.

name: Reception Party
description:
Fine, you're the symbol of Victoria's invincibility, our saviors here to help us. Can we get going now?
Allies have greatly reduced cost limit.
